It shows 326 posts and 1
column2: 038 followers] Hello everyone! Thank you for helping us surpass 1
column3: 000 followers!Â To celebrate
column4: Goofy Shelter Cats wants to see your goofy shelter cat AND donate to a shelter of your choice! 1. Submit a picture of a cat you or your family adopted. We will accept submissions between May 4
column6: 2017 11:59 PM EST. 2. We will post all the submissions at the same time on May 12. 3.Â The OP of the submission with the most notes on May 18 at 11:59 PM EST will choose a shelter for the Goofy Shelter Cats blog to donate $25 to! Guidelines: - Submit cats adopted from a shelter and include details about your catâ€™s name and a few details about them. - Submitter must be willing to share what shelter they want us to make a donation to - this could be the shelter you adopted your cat from
column7: or any other shelter! We must be able to make the donation online
column8: directly to the shelter. Please confirm that your are comfortable with us: 1) posting who won (just your URL)
column9: and 2) what shelter you asked us to donate to. - Mod Kindred Spirit will send you a screenshot of the donation receipt.   - Reblog
column11: reply - what counts is how many notes your submission gets! Just donâ€™t spam your followers.   - You can reblog this post to spread the word
column12: but it does not count for anything toward making the donation. Thank you for all your love and support for Goofy Shelter Cats!  We are now accepting submissions! Please boost and submit!  We are continuing to accept submissions! " False text

mostlycatsmostly 161033589827 "2017-05-24 21:21:29 GMT" https://mostlycatsmostly.tumblr.com/post/161033589827/this-vet-clinic-is-seeking-a-professional-cat "By Hilary HansonÂ Who wouldnâ€™t want to get paid to do this?   A job opening at a Dublin veterinary clinic is getting a ton of attention because
column2: well
column3: it basically sounds like a dream job for cat enthusiasts.  â€œCat Cuddles Needed!â€ reads the job posting at Just Cats Veterinary Clinic & Cattery
column4: a veterinary clinic devoted to â€” you guessed it â€” cats.Â The post asks potential applicants some crucial questions to see if theyâ€™re the right fit:Â Are you a crazy cat person and loves cats?Â Does cattitude come naturally to you?Â Have you counted kittens before you go asleepDo you feed the stray cats in your locality?Â Does petting cats make you feel warm and fuzzy?Â The site explains that a cat cuddlerâ€™s responsibility is to help calm felines that may be anxious about their time at the vet. Thatâ€™s why qualifications include â€œgentle hands capable of petting and stroking cats for long periods of time
column5: â€ a soft-spoken demeanor and â€œan ability to understand different types of purring.â€ (For those confused about what this last one means â€” purring is typically associated with being content
column6: but cats also sometimes purr when they are stressed or afraid.)Â With all the attention the job is getting (not to mention how amazing it sounds)
column7: itâ€™s sure to be ultra-competitive. Itâ€™s also not clear from the post whether the clinic is accepting international applicants.Â But if youâ€™re still dying to cuddle cats and kittens
column8: youâ€™re in luck.  Animal shelters are often in need of volunteers to socialize and play with the animals in their care. The need is especially strong during kitten season â€” the warmer months of the year when lots of kittens are born and many animal shelters become overwhelmed with homeless young felines. Rescue groups also often need people to foster kittens that were separated from their mothers too early
column9: meaning you can even cuddle kittens in the comfort of your own home.  Sure
column10: you might not be getting paid
column11: but professional cat cuddlers have to start somewhere.Â " True link

mostlycatsmostly 159247142462 "2017-04-06 01:10:03 GMT" https://mostlycatsmostly.tumblr.com/post/159247142462/click-here-to-support-help-sierra-kinney-repay-vet "cartilogenophobe: cartilogenophobe:  Hello. Â This is Whiskers. Â This morning
column2: April 2
column4: Whiskers had to  be put down after an incident with a urethral blockage that left his  urethra torn and his kidneys basically completely dysfunctional. Â  Whiskers was only a little over 3 years old and this whole ordeal came  on very suddenly. Â Because of the suddenness
column7: turned  to me to help pay for the medical bills. Â Sierra is a disabled veteran  (diagnosed PTSD and Type 1 Diabetes) and has been living with me
column8: my  wife and another roommate for about 3 years now. Â She has no source of  income other than what she gets from the VA. Â Whiskers has been with  Sierra since her terrible divorce with her wife and a move from Kentucky  to Texas - which left her with basically her van and the clothes on her  back - and now
column9: heâ€™s passed and sheâ€™s left with nearly $2000 to repay
column10: no cat and a whole lot of feelings to unpack - on top of trying to  secure a job
column11: get back in to school and trying to get her own health  under control.Helping Sierra repay this debt would take a great  stress off of her and allow her to focus on mourning
column12: as well as the  things she needs to do to get her life and health back in order.Thank you for your time and double thank you for your donation. 					   Iâ€™m going out on a limb here and trying this.Â  Iâ€™m not asking for a donation from any of you tagged below - just a signal boost.Â  Just a single reblog.Â  Please.Â  It would help so much.Â  Weâ€™ve managed to raise $145 so far.Â  Iâ€™ve gotten a lot of notes
column13: but only 6 donations.Â  Your reaches are great and we could really use the help.Â  Please. @markiplier @markruffalo @neil-gaiman @thatsthat24 @calebhyles @pusheen @thresholdofzero @tastefullyoffensive @therealjacksepticeye @targetretales @mostlycatsmostly @asklochlan @asktheboywholived  " False link

column1: mostlycatsmostly 157840195472 "2017-03-01 00:14:32 GMT" https://mostlycatsmostly.tumblr.com/post/157840195472/pets-at-home-is-taking-dry-cat-food-off-the "PETS at Home has recalled four lines of cat food after some animals collapsed and started fitting. The major pet retailer said the three cats became â€œseriously unwellâ€.A statement on the companyâ€™s website says: â€œWe are sorry to inform you that we are recalling these AVA products from our range of dry cat food.â€œAn investigation has revealed that
column2: in the four affected products
column3: the level of thiamine (vitamin B1) was much lower than we had specified. Testing confirmed only these four products are affected.â€œWe are aware of three cats which
column5: became seriously unwell four to six weeks after switching to one of the affected products and required veterinary care. All three cats exhibited symptoms of sudden collapse
column7: widespread twitching and general unsteadiness which are not the classic symptoms of thiamine deficiency.â€What AVA products are affected? Product: AVA Veterinary Approved Grain Free Mature 7+ Cat Food Optimum HealthPack size: 2kgProduct code (under the barcode): 7120400Batch codes:6165 â€“ best before 14 June 20176181 â€“ best before 30 June 20176295 â€“ best before 22 October 20176363 â€“ best before 29 December 2017Product: AVA Veterinary Approved Grain Free Mature 7+ Cat Food Optimum HealthPack size: 4kgProduct code (under the barcode): 712401Batch codes:6165 â€“ best before 14 June 20176169 â€“ best before 18 June 20176210 â€“ best before 29 July 20176252 â€“ best before 09 September 20176325 â€“ best before 21 November 20177016 â€“ best before 16 January 2018Product: AVA Veterinary Approved Grain Free Senior 12+ Cat Food Optimum HealthPack size: 2kgProduct code (under the barcode): 712402Batch codes:6161 â€“ best before 10 June 20176166 â€“ best before 15 June 20176229 â€“ best before 17 August 2017Product: AVA Veterinary Approved Grain Free Adult Cat Food Indoor/NeuturedPack size: 1.5kgProduct code (under the barcode): 712407Batch codes:6165 â€“ best before 14 June 20176166 â€“ best before 15 June 20176188 â€“ best before 07 July 20177006 â€“ best before 6 January 2018â€œIf you have bought any of the listed products with the specified product codes
column8: please return it to where you bought it for a full refund or call 0800 328 4204.â€œIf you have concerns that your cat may be showing any of these symptoms after switching to one of the four affected products then you should stop feeding and seek immediate veterinary advice.â€œYou can also contact one of Pets At Home customer advisers on 0800 328 4204 for general advice.â€  @geopsych Thank you for sending.   " True link

column1: mostlycatsmostly 147665348262 "2016-07-19 22:46:02 GMT" https://mostlycatsmostly.tumblr.com/post/147665348262/help-me-give-a-kind-cat-the-help-it-needs "duskhaze: Weâ€™ve had this cat wandering around our neighborhood for several weeks now
column2: and he used to be a lot more healthy and clean and no one could catch him
column3: but heâ€™s so ill that he just sat there and let my neighbor pick him up. I happened to run into them just after it happened
column4: and they said they couldnâ€™t do anything with him
column5: so I offered to take him in. Heâ€™s very sick. It looks like he got attacked by another animal
column6: probably a cat (and I donâ€™t mean gotten into a fight
column7: all of his wounds are on his hind end like he was running away and got grabbed from behind)
column8: has blood in his urine which is most likely a severe urinary tract infection
column9: limps on his back left leg
